DOC.brief_summary: To explore whether Free androgen index（FAI）can regard biochemically diagnostic index high androgen hormone blood patient Polycentric ovary syndrome（PCOS） . Also explore whether Sex hormone-binding globulin（SHBG） FAI see therapeutic effect indicatrixes woman PCOS .
DOC.brief_title: The Potential Biochemical Diagnosis Criteria Therapeutic Effect Indexes : Sex Hormone Binding Globulin Levels Free Androgen Index Blood Patients With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
DOC.mesh_term: Cyproterone acetate , ethinyl estradiol drug combination
DOC.criteria: The clinical diagnosis criterion PCOS European Society Human Reproduction Embryology , Rotterdam work group American Society Reproductive Medicine ( ESHRE /ASRM ) hyperprolactinemia endocrine diseases high androgen hormone blood , namely Cushing 's syndrome , congenital adrenal hyperplasia ( CAH ) , ovarian adrenal tumor
